definitions.example: He came to my aid when I was foundering.

definitions.definition: Something which helps; a material source of help.
definitions.example: Slimming aids include dietary supplements and appetite suppressants.

definitions.definition: An historical subsidy granted to the crown by Parliament for an extraordinary purpose, such as a war effort.
A pecuniary tribute paid by a vassal to his feudal lord on special occasions.
An aide-de-camp, so called by abbreviation.
definitions.example: The incompetent general's brilliant aid often made priceless suggestions.

definitions.definition: To provide support to; to further the progress of; to help; to assist.
To climb with the use of aids such as pitons.
